summary: Hired to kill a nobleman, the assassin instead falls for the former's unstable wife.
cast: Jimmy Sheirgill|Mahie Gill|Randeep Hooda|Shreya Narayan|Deepal Shaw|Rajiv Gupta|Deep Raj Rana|Vipin Sharma|Kanika Dang|Sonal Joshi|Mukti Mohan|Sitaram Panchal|Rahul Mittra|Brijendra Kala|Ashrad Ali|Sharfaraz Ali|Bharat Bendre|Umesh Bhoi|Sanjay Brown|Karan Butani|Hemendra Dandotiya|Amit Dhawan|Dubey|Dennis Gomez|Sharad Kakkar|Dharmesh Kalal|Amlish Mondal|Ashok Pandey|Khyati Pandya|Nehal Pandya|Rohit Pandya|Raju Pathan|Rama Rao|Resham|Hemant Sharma|Lallan Singh|Vanraj Singh Sisodia|Ashish Sutar|Rohit Tiwari|Mukesh Tyagi
title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster
